name: Down Bat
description:
Flap and dive your way through town looking for tasty bugs. Eat as many as you can bugs as you can before you get too sleepy.

Controls - Keyboard
Move - WASD / Arrow Keys
Flap - Space Bar
Dive / Chomp - Enter

Controls - Controller
Move - Left Stick
Flap - Bottom Button
Dive/Chomp - Left Button
